contents: My restaurant will thrive because of my experience. I’ve done everything, from bussing tables to cooking to hosting. I know all the details and understand the jobs and needs of all my workers. (22) <u>I also understand what customers want and how to make you feel welcome.</u> (23) <u>As a result</u>, remembering a face and greeting someone by name goes a lot farther than remembering the capital of South Dakota. It will be hard work, but I know I can do it. (24) ___________.
